title: bailige bailAgidu
sahitya:
bailige bailAgudu bailoLage


caraNam 1    sUtra bombeyu mADi hari sUtradim kuNisADi 
sUtra kaDiyitu bombe muriyitu Ata nintidu kELo manuja
    caraNam 2    candAgi jyOtiyu beLagi eNNeyu battiyu hAki eNNe 
mugiyitu batti kaDiyitu kattalu Ayitu kELo mauja
    caraNam 3    neNTariSTaru kUDi avaru sante gOskaravAgi 
sante mugiyitu cinte hattitu bhrAnti Ayitu kELo manuja
    caraNam 4    bAleyobbaLu kUDi avaLu nIri gOskara pOgi 
nIru tumbitu kAlu jAritu koDavu oDeyitu kELu manuja
    caraNam 5    paripari vidhadali nAnu paramAtmana stutiya mADi parama 
mUruti purandara viTTalane karuNiso pAliso parama dayALo
